title: Crash
body: Every time I try to launch the game it says "PVP.net Patcher Kernel Has Stopped Working" But only on one computer. Is anybody else having this problem?

replies.body:
Ah, this annoying error usually means League isn't launching with the correct permissions. You should be able to resolve this by launching League as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*) from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file from within the installation directory:

> **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Let me know if this resolved your issue.

ive had the same problem before , i tried to switch back to old client and my pc was just not having it so i had to wipe the game off my pc completely with all the connected files to it and reinstall the old client, now it works just fine

been having the same problem. if ur using windows, try running it on windows 8 settings. if u've already reinstalled the game, try opting out of using the beta client outright. i'm still testing some stuff. im inclined to think it's a communication issue between windows and the patcher but i can't say for certain.
